command.name: adj-rib

parameter.name: peer
parameter.description: peer whose adj-RIB must be shown

command.abstract: show the content of the adj-RIB

description.p: This command can be used to show the content of the input or output adj-RIB of a peer. The commands works similarly to show ribbgp_router_show_rib except that a direction (in|out) and a peer can be specified.
